default-db.help: Select the AV database to be used for AV scanning.
default-db.name: default-db

grayware.help: Enable/disable grayware detection when an AntiVirus profile is applied to traffic.
grayware.name: grayware

override-timeout.help: Override the large file scan timeout value in seconds (30 - 3600). Zero is the default value and is used to disable this command. When disabled, the daemon adjusts the large file scan timeout based on the file size.
override-timeout.name: override-timeout
